A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had low expectations and planned to launch a website devoted to how bad the porgs ruined the movie. First off\, I thought they were actually really funny and added just a hint of humor. There were some of the funniest moments I have ever seen in this genre  - Oscar Isaac is a joy. But\, what I loved most about this movie was the gravitas. I was simply moved as an audience member. It was truly breathtaking. Is it the best? I don't know yet. I will tell you after I have seen 200 times.
